name: STRESS: The Game (BETA)
description:
This is STRESS

the game that will put you to the test in terms of reflexes and pascience. It does not require many controls, It is simple and easy to handle. This game is in beta, they will be adding more things and completing for the next version. At the moment this is what is finished, Many things wait for the next version, Enjoy it!

Follow the game!: https://gamejolt.com/@uggames
